original: Larsson, Gustaf Sigfrid Laurentius, landsfiskal, e. o. civilförsvarsdirektör, Växjö, f. 5/] 1/97 i Kristianopel, Blek. 1., av kustöveruppsyn :nian Peter L. o. Gustava Johansson, G. 30 m. Evy Sonia Margareta Nyblom. Barn: Jan f. 34, Peter 42. — Stud:ex. 18, lands-fiskalsex. 24. LandskansL v. länsstyr. i Kronob. län 28, landsfiskal i Älme-boda distr. 32-41, i Lessebo distr. sed. 41, hemortsförsv :assist. i Kronob. län 42-44, e. o. civilförsv :dir. där sed. 44. Ordf. i flera tax:ndr sed. 28, i Skruvs RK-krets, i dess badhusfören. samt i dess IF 34-44. OffBLeopII :sO, RLSF förtjGM, SvRK förtj :plak. i silver, HollRK förtjSA/I, Christian X :s fri-liM.
translated: Larsson, Gustaf Sigfrid Laurentius, county fiscal, acting director of civil defense, Växjö, born on 5th January 1897 in Kristianopel, Blekinge, 1st child of coast inspection man Peter L. and Gustava Johansson. Married to Evy Sonia Margareta Nyblom in 1930. Children: Jan (born in 1934), Peter (born in 1942). Completed high school exams in 1918, became a county fiscal examiner in 1924. Appointed county governor's councilor in Kronoberg County in 1928. Served as county fiscal in Älmhult district from 1932 to 1941, and in Lessebo district since 1941. Also worked as an assistant in home defense in Kronoberg County from 1942 to 1944, and as an acting director of civil defense since 1944. Was chairman of several tax committees since 1928, chairman of Skruv's Red Cross district, of its bathhouse association, and of its sports club from 1934 to 1944. Knight of the Order of Vasa (OffBLeopII), recipient of the Swedish Red Cross Medal of Merit (RLSF förtjGM), recipient of the Swedish Red Cross silver plaque of merit (SvRK förtj:plak. i silver), recipient of the Dutch Red Cross Medal of Merit (HollRK förtjSA/I), and recipient of Christian X's Freedom Medal (Christian X:s fri-liM).
